data.name: radioChannelSDPriority.Text
data.value: Give priority to Standard Definition (SD). Corresponding HD channel number will start with 'H'

data.name: radioChannelHDPriority.Text
data.value: Give priority to High Definition (HD). Corresponding SD channel number will start with 'S'

data.name: labelChannelAssignmentExplanation.Text
data.value:
The list of channels comprises all channels, regardless of their broadcast definition. Therefore, there will be duplicated channel numbers when the same channel is broadcasted in HD and SD.
Which channels should appear first?

data.name: labelEpgWarning.Text
data.value: WARNING: The EPG functionality is still under development and has not been thoroughly tested. Some functions may fail or not work as expected.
